dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3493205X] Serious violations
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme
nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: Alessandro Simonetto [mailto:alessandro@onclassical.com] 
Sent: Friday, March 16, 2007 11:08 AM
To: DMCA
Subject: Re: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3493205X] Serious violations

To Whom It May Concern,

Uh? The website hamienet you hosted HAVE STOLEN OUR FILES and posted 
them on his site without any authorization and you call it a 
non-copyright infringiment????!!!!

Kindly,

Alessandro Simonetto

ONCLASSICAL by A.Simonetto
c/o Via Ca'Petofi 13
I-36022 Cassola, Vicenza

Ph. (00)39 0423 930493
Mob. (00)39 339 3162931
Fax. (00)39 0424 533137

Kunst der Fuge, http://kunstderfuge.com/
ONCLASSICAL, http://www.onclassical.com/
CLASSICAland, http://classicaland.com/
''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''
Find me at Skype by simply searching for OnClassical
Please do not publish my email/s on the web, thanks!


----- Original Message ----- 
From: "DMCA" <dmca@theplanet.com>
To: <alessandro@onclassical.com>
Cc: <Theplanet@chillingeffects.org>
Sent: Friday, March 16, 2007 4:57 PM
Subject: FW: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3493205X] Serious violations

To Claude Pardy

We sent the following email to the webmaster of hamienet.com hosted
from:

    Everyones Internet, domains@ev1servers.net
    http://www.ev1servers.net

please provide to contact the webmaster of hamienet.com and to inform
him about his serious copyright violation! Thank you!

-- 

To the webmasters of hamienet.com,

You hosted our private files and contributors' work without any
license. Remove our material from your site as soon as possibile. You
have not obtained any permission to publish our files on your site. If
we don't see any modification until 1-2 days we will surely proceed
against you by legal ways.

The owner of kunstderfuge.com,

Alessandro Simonetto

ONCLASSICAL by A.Simonetto
c/o Via Ca'Petofi 13
I-36022 Cassola, Vicenza

Ph. (00)39 0423 930493
